single-action: `CLICK` the 'Firefox' icon to open the browser
`CLICK` the address bar and `TYPE` 'https://www.twitch.tv/'
`KEY` ENTER
`WAIT` for Twitch homepage to load
`CLICK` 'Log In' button
`CLICK` email/username input and `TYPE` '<USERNAME_PLACEHOLDER>'
`CLICK` password input and `TYPE` '<PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER>'
`CLICK` 'Log In' or press `ENTER`
`WAIT` for login to complete (handle saved-session flow if already logged in)
`CLICK` the address bar and `TYPE` the streamer's channel URL (e.g., 'https://www.twitch.tv/<streamer>')
`KEY` ENTER
`WAIT` for the streamer page and player to load
`CLICK` the video player if playback is paused to start playing
`ENSURE` video is playing (play icon changed or currentTime > 0)
`WATCH` until the drop eligibility criteria/time is met (agent monitors the 'Drops' or 'Claim' prompt)
`WAIT` until a 'Claim' or 'Collect' button appears on the player or in the channel panel
`CLICK` the 'Claim' / 'Collect' button
`WAIT` for the confirmation modal or 'Added to Inventory' message
`CLICK` the user avatar → 'Drops' or 'Inventory'
`VERIFY` the claimed drop appears in Drops/Inventory list
`CLOSE` any modals and the browser tab
